about_the_game:
● ● ● ● ● ● ● ● ●
Penetrate deep into the world of SOULCOOM™ with the kinetic motion of your mouse or touchscreen!

SOULCOOM™ is a high fidelity 2.5D sex simulator powered by our exclusive Fantasy Physics engine. Control your model’s horny little mouth from the kinetic feedback of your mouse or touchpad with over 6,144 ​hand drawn interactive expressions!

SOULCOOM™ is the soulful fusion of mouse interaction physics, hand drawn animation and comprehensive character customization. In SOULCOOM™ your model’s appearance is customizable from head to toe—equip or craft new eugenic items to your model’s inventory slots to completely transform their hair, skin, breasts & more!

Relax inside of the healing soundscapes of SOULCOOM™ or take control and fill your model’s eager holes! Enjoy our international voice model cast, now featuring over 15 unique performances from all over the world. Craft your custom models from the comfort of your sound soaked in-game laboratory and unlock rich new features while exploring the map as we develop the game!

The demo is available for free! To access the developer build and support our game's exciting production, join us and become a part of our cozy community as we design the 2D sex simulator of your dreams.
detailed_description:
Update Notes

Free Demo!

Like What You See? Support Our Development to Unlock New Content!



About the Demo

● ● ● ● ● ● ● ● ●
Penetrate deep into the world of SOULCOOM™ with the kinetic motion of your mouse or touchscreen!

SOULCOOM™ is a high fidelity 2.5D sex simulator powered by our exclusive Fantasy Physics engine. Control your model’s horny little mouth from the kinetic feedback of your mouse or touchpad with over 6,144 ​hand drawn interactive expressions!

SOULCOOM™ is the soulful fusion of mouse interaction physics, hand drawn animation and comprehensive character customization. In SOULCOOM™ your model’s appearance is customizable from head to toe—equip or craft new eugenic items to your model’s inventory slots to completely transform their hair, skin, breasts & more!

Relax inside of the healing soundscapes of SOULCOOM™ or take control and fill your model’s eager holes! Enjoy our international voice model cast, now featuring over 15 unique performances from all over the world. Craft your custom models from the comfort of your sound soaked in-game laboratory and unlock rich new features while exploring the map as we develop the game!

The demo is available for free! To access the developer build and support our game's exciting production, join us and become a part of our cozy community as we design the 2D sex simulator of your dreams.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18 LTS or Equivalent
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-7400 CPU @ 3.00GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 - 2GB
  • Storage: 810 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Specifications compatible with AMD equivalent hardware.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18 LTS or Equivalent
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core i7 (I7-8700) 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 16 Series GTX 1650 - 4GB
  • Storage: 810 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Specifications compatible with AMD equivalent hardware.

short_description: SOULCOOM™ is a high-fidelity 2D sex simulation between real anime girls powered by our exclusive Fantasy Physics engine. Control and customize your model’s horny little mouth from the kinetic feedback of your mouse or touchpad with over 6,144 hand-drawn interactive expressions!
